title: trapcoder666
author: trapcoder666
created_time: August 31, 2022, 11:27:35 AMLast edit: October 01, 2022, 05:20:42 PM by trapcoder666
content: I will be managing this avatar campaign on behalf of my dear friend agentf. This campaign will run throughout the month (until the 30th September 2022). As you all may or may not have noticed , preev.com is no longer online. This project will be ad- free and those who want to support the project, may also change their avatars to the one given below. We truly appreciate your support. Avatar campaign rules- Please wear the Avatar picture and change your personal text which will be pasted below- This campaign does not apply to those with legitimate negative feedback from DT members. All participants will be screened prior to selection- A minimum of 35 constructive posts need to be made for the month - Posts need to be at least 150 characters in length- Any posts in off-topic and local boards will not be counted- Burst posting and spam will lead to disqualification- All enrolled users who then receive legitimate negative feedbacks will be disqualified from the campaign- Removing or changing your avatar during the campaign period will lead to disqualification as well- This campaign will be tightly monitored so if any alt- account is detected, the participant will be immediately disqualified - Payment will be void if any of the above terms is not adhered toPayments- All payments will be made in BTC equivalent . Payment structure as below : Available Slots legendary x  FULLhero member x  FULLsr. member x  FULLfull member x  FULLTotal participant slots= 40Payment Amount$70 per month x 10 legendary  ($700 total)$55 per month x 10 hero member  ($550 total)$40 per month x 10 sr. member  ($400 total)$35 per month x 10 full member ($350 total)So to summarize, a minimum of 35 constructive posts is required to qualify for the payout at the end of the campaign.Payout Structure- This campaign will end on the 30th of September 2022. Allow 2 -3 days after the campaign end date for payment disbursement. - All payments will be made directly by agentfRequirementsAvatar - To qualify for this campaign, please change your avatar and personal text to the one below alt link to the avatar : https://i.imgur.com/g5ShjKT.jpgPersonal Text - Please change your personal text to : PNNV.COM Live bitcoin price monitorParticipitation Please post your username , current post amount & bitcoin payout addressSignature (optional)Optional. For those who want to support us, we would truly appreciate it. Signature campaign will be starting in the near future. comments.author: MainIbem
comments.body: Hello dear, i find no slot for Sr. member rank. Does this means they are not required to join the campaign or what could be the issues.Suggestion; why not include signature code as well instead only averter campaign and the pay rate for all ranks are the same. There should be little variation btw these ranks. Please if any slot Sr. member rank then would love to leave my application.Thanks and good luck.

comments.author: trapcoder666
comments.body: Post has been updated.This is an Avatar only campaign to support the community project.Payment is per month as stated on the updated main thread. As you know preeve.com is no longer operational and this project will be a community driven one. It will be an ad- free project and also will always maintain a clean and minimal interface. So those who want to further support the project, may also change their avatars. Thanks

comments.author: trapcoder666
comments.body: Quote from: Maestro75 on August 31, 2022, 12:27:04 PMQuote from: Distinctin on August 31, 2022, 11:35:23 AMSignature and avatar would be good with this rate, please count me in.Payment is monthly and not weekly before you say the rate is a good one for both signature and avatar?As stated on OP it's an avatar only campaign buddy. Payments are monthly

comments.body: Quote from: Maestro75 on August 31, 2022, 12:27:04 PMQuote from: Distinctin on August 31, 2022, 11:35:23 AMSignature and avatar would be good with this rate, please count me in.Payment is monthly and not weekly before you say the rate is a good one for both signature and avatar?That post of mine was before OP updated the thread, LOL... I was thinking it's on a weekly basis but it turns out a monthly basis. It's still good for those who do not have a campaign now, you are free to apply if you want and just disregard it if you don't.just one question to OP, is there any chance the funds would be put in escrow?

Why not escrowed the funds and post the escrow address along with on the campaign thread for more trust and transparencies if you think people won't trusted you after the campaign ends for payments.

Is there something confusing about that rule?Quote from: MainIbem on August 31, 2022, 01:52:05 PMWhy not escrowed the funds and post the escrow address along with on the campaign thread for more trust and transparencies if you think people won't trusted you after the campaign ends for payments.  Please DYOR. They just posted their new service/website here to act as a good alternative in the absence of Preev.com (which is likely can consider inactive by now).  If they will shit on this campaign, what will they gain in return?

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Quote from: MainIbem on August 31, 2022, 01:52:05 PMWhy not escrowed the funds and post the escrow address along with on the campaign thread for more trust and transparencies if you think people won't trusted you after the campaign ends for payments. You are correct. Escrow is good for a fresh manager like him starting a campaign. But we have also seen managers who never escrowed payments yet they paid. Am hoping he will pay as a member who has some positive trust on his profile. He has some site running and I do not think he will want to mess that up with scam accusations on his person.

comments.author: trapcoder666
comments.body: After further discussion, the minimum constructive post amount has been fixed to 35. Again, this is not a money making project. Agentf launched it as a service to the community bearing all costs and he's also well respected member of the community. There's nothing to gain with him risking his rep and project by not paying at the end of the campaign.Also please do not dm me for spots. Post your details on the thread here.
